html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-06671997-04-220,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of the following persons as trustees of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years. (JEAN H. PICARD, of Montreal, Quebec, in the place of Bertrand Morin, whose term has expired; and TONY TASCONA, of Winnipeg, Manitoba, in the place of David Mirvish, whose term has expired)
Attachments
